document_name: Mainstreaming Environment Climata Change into Development Plans
Mainstreaming Environment Climate Change in Development Plans

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: This project aims at ensuring that environment and climate change are mainstreamed in most economically important and vulnerable sectors of the economy in Tanzania leading to poverty reduced levels while maintaining environmental integrity.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The output will result in National Climate Financing Mechanism to support Tanzania to collect, coordinate, blend and account for climate change finance.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The output will result in improved level of information availability and awareness on climate change impacts and adaptation strategies, environmental laws and regulation among the general public and rural communities.

project_descr: This project aims at ensuring that environment and climate change are mainstreamed in most economically important and vulnerable sectors of the economy in Tanzania leading to poverty reduced levels while maintaining environmental integrity.
project_title: Mainstreaming Environment & Climate Change in Dev plans
